suite.name: Zenklub Testes Gherkin Bdd

test.name: Test Case 01 - Login

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then I need to be able to login on Zenklub website
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.arg: locator=//span[@class='zk-button zk-rounded-full zk-font-thick zk-flex zk-justify-center zk-items-center zk-w-full zk-transition zk-duration-300 zk-text-center zk-uppercase ng-tns-c42-0 ng-trigger ng-trigger-loading zk-cursor-pointer active:zk-bg-primary hover:zk-bg-primary-light hover:zk-text-white-base zk-bg-primary zk-text-white-base zk-h-12'][contains(.,'Entrar')]
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element '//span[@class='zk-button zk-rounded-full zk-font-thick zk-flex zk-justify-center zk-items-center zk-w-full zk-transition zk-duration-300 zk-text-center zk-uppercase ng-tns-c42-0 ng-trigger ng-trigger-loading zk-cursor-pointer active:zk-bg-primary hover:zk-bg-primary-light hover:zk-text-white-base zk-bg-primary zk-text-white-base zk-h-12'][contains(.,'Entrar')]'.

kw.name: Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.doc: This test checks the login to the website zenklub.com.br

test.name: Test Case 02 - Pesquisa de um Produto

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Given I have logged in to the Zenklub page
I need to be able to login on Zenklub website
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.arg: locator=//span[@class='zk-button zk-rounded-full zk-font-thick zk-flex zk-justify-center zk-items-center zk-w-full zk-transition zk-duration-300 zk-text-center zk-uppercase ng-tns-c42-0 ng-trigger ng-trigger-loading zk-cursor-pointer active:zk-bg-primary hover:zk-bg-primary-light hover:zk-text-white-base zk-bg-primary zk-text-white-base zk-h-12'][contains(.,'Entrar')]

kw.name: When I be redirected to /profile/sessions "Você ainda não fez nenhuma sessão. Encontre o profissional perfeito para você ainda hoje Você ainda não fez nenhuma sessão. Encontre o profissional perfeito para você ainda hoje "
I need to be able to login on Zenklub website
Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.arg: locator=//span[@class='zk-button zk-rounded-full zk-font-thick zk-flex zk-justify-center zk-items-center zk-w-full zk-transition zk-duration-300 zk-text-center zk-uppercase ng-tns-c42-0 ng-trigger ng-trigger-loading zk-cursor-pointer active:zk-bg-primary hover:zk-bg-primary-light hover:zk-text-white-base zk-bg-primary zk-text-white-base zk-h-12'][contains(.,'Entrar')]
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element '//span[@class='zk-button zk-rounded-full zk-font-thick zk-flex zk-justify-center zk-items-center zk-w-full zk-transition zk-duration-300 zk-text-center zk-uppercase ng-tns-c42-0 ng-trigger ng-trigger-loading zk-cursor-pointer active:zk-bg-primary hover:zk-bg-primary-light hover:zk-text-white-base zk-bg-primary zk-text-white-base zk-h-12'][contains(.,'Entrar')]'.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains
kw.arg: text=" Você ainda não fez nenhuma sessão. Encontre o profissional perfeito para você ainda hoje "
kw.doc: Waits until ``text`` appears on the current page.
kw.msg: Text '" Você ainda não fez nenhuma sessão. Encontre o profissional perfeito para você ainda hoje "' did not appear in 5 seconds.

kw.name: Then I should not have any session scheduled "Agendar Sessão"
Capture Page Screenshot
kw.doc: Takes a screenshot of the current page and embeds it into a log file.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

test.status: Text '" Você ainda não fez nenhuma sessão. Encontre o profissional perfeito para você ainda hoje "' did not appear in 5 seconds.

suite.doc: Essa suíte testa o site da zenklub.com.br
